### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5) 
-  Chest (position x=40.5, y=-80.5)
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate factory
No structures found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure the research technology is valid and available before setting it
### Errors when mining with burner mining drill
-  Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full before mining
-  Ensure the fuel source is not full before mining
### Errors when using furnace
-  Make sure there are ingredients to smelt before using the furnace
### Errors when using boiler
-  Ensure the boiler has fuel before using it
### Errors when using generator
-  Make sure there is input liquid and fluid present in connections before using the generator
### Errors when using pipe
-  Ensure the pipe is connected to a fluid system before using it
